definitions.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.
definitions.name: project_short_name

definitions.description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-DX-A8BN
definitions.name: case_barcode

definitions.description: TCGA sample barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
definitions.name: sample_barcode_tumor

definitions.description: TCGA sample barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
definitions.name: sample_barcode_normal

definitions.description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
definitions.name: aliquot_barcode_tumor

definitions.description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
definitions.name: aliquot_barcode_normal

definitions.description: HUGO symbol for the gene (HUGO symbols are always in all caps). Unknown is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene
definitions.name: Hugo_Symbol

definitions.description: Entrez gene ID (an integer). 0 is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene region or Ensembl ID
definitions.name: Entrez_Gene_Id

definitions.description: One or more genome sequencing center reporting the variant
definitions.name: Center

definitions.description: The reference genome used for the alignment (GRCh38)
definitions.name: NCBI_Build

definitions.description: Chromosome, possible values: chr1-22, and chrX
definitions.name: Chromosome

definitions.description: Lowest numeric position of the reported variant on the genomic reference sequence. Mutation start coordinate
definitions.name: Start_Position

definitions.description: Highest numeric genomic position of the reported variant on the genomic reference sequence. Mutation end coordinate
definitions.name: End_Position

definitions.description: Either + or - to denote whether read mapped to the sense (+) or anti-sense (-) strand
definitions.name: Strand

definitions.description: Translational effect of variant allele
definitions.name: Variant_Classification

definitions.description: Type of mutation. TNP (tri-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to DNP (di-nucleotide polymorphism) but for three consecutive nucleotides. ONP (oligo-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to TNP but for consecutive runs of four or more (SNP, DNP, TNP, ONP, INS, DEL, or Consolidated)
definitions.name: Variant_Type

definitions.description: The plus strand reference allele at this position. Includes the deleted sequence for a deletion or - for an insertion
definitions.name: Reference_Allele

definitions.description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases
definitions.name: Tumor_Seq_Allele1

definitions.description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 2. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases
definitions.name: Tumor_Seq_Allele2

definitions.description: The rs-IDs from the   dbSNP database, novel if not found in any database used, or null if there is no dbSNP record, but it is found in other databases
definitions.name: dbSNP_RS

definitions.description: The dbSNP validation status is reported as a semicolon-separated list of statuses. The union of all rs-IDs is taken when there are multiple
definitions.name: dbSNP_Val_Status

definitions.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Tumor genotyping (validation) for allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases
definitions.name: Tumor_Validation_Allele1

definitions.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Tumor genotyping (validation) for allele 2
definitions.name: Tumor_Validation_Allele2

definitions.description: An assessment of the mutation as somatic, germline, LOH, post transcriptional modification, unknown, or none. The values allowed in this field are constrained by the value in the Validation_Status field
definitions.name: Mutation_Status

definitions.description: The assay platforms used for the validation call
definitions.name: Validation_Method

definitions.description: Instrument used to produce primary sequence data
definitions.name: Sequencer

definitions.description: Unique GDC identifier for tumor aliquot (10189 unique)
definitions.name: Tumor_Sample_UUID

definitions.description: Unique GDC identifier for normal aliquot (10189 unique)
definitions.name: Matched_Norm_Sample_UUID

definitions.description: The coding sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format
definitions.name: HGVSc

definitions.description: The protein sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format. p.= signifies no change in the protein
definitions.name: HGVSp

definitions.description: Same as the HGVSp column, but using 1-letter amino-acid codes
definitions.name: HGVSp_Short

definitions.description: Ensembl ID of the transcript affected by the variant
definitions.name: Transcript_ID

definitions.description: The exon number (out of total number)
definitions.name: Exon_Number

definitions.description: Read depth across this locus in tumor BAM
definitions.name: t_depth

definitions.description: Read depth supporting the reference allele in tumor BAM
definitions.name: t_ref_count

definitions.description: Read depth supporting the variant allele in tumor BAM
definitions.name: t_alt_count

definitions.description: Read depth across this locus in normal BAM
definitions.name: n_depth

definitions.description: A semicolon delimited list of all possible variant effects, sorted by priority ([Symbol,Consequence,HGVSp_Short,Transcript_ID,RefSeq,HGVSc,Impact,Canonical,Sift,PolyPhen,Strand])
definitions.name: all_effects

definitions.description: The variant allele used to calculate the consequence
definitions.name: Allele

definitions.description: The gene symbol. In this table, gene symbol is gene name e.g. ACADVL
definitions.name: Gene

definitions.description: Stable Ensembl ID of feature (transcript, regulatory, motif)
definitions.name: Feature

definitions.description: Type of feature. Currently one of Transcript, RegulatoryFeature, MotifFeature (or blank)
definitions.name: Feature_type

definitions.description: The single consequence of the canonical transcript in  sequence ontology terms, eg missense_variant
definitions.name: One_Consequence

definitions.description: Consequence type of this variant; sequence ontology terms
definitions.name: Consequence

definitions.description: Relative position of base pair in the cDNA sequence as a fraction. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in cDNA
definitions.name: cDNA_position

definitions.description: Relative position of base pair in coding sequence. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in coding sequence
definitions.name: CDS_position

definitions.description: Relative position of affected amino acid in protein. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in coding sequence
definitions.name: Protein_position

definitions.description: Amino acid substitution caused by the mutation. Only given if the variation affects the protein-coding sequence
definitions.name: Amino_acids

definitions.description: The alternative codons with the variant base in upper case
definitions.name: Codons

definitions.description: Known identifier of existing variation
definitions.name: Existing_variation

definitions.description: Allele number from input; 0 is reference, 1 is first alternate etc.
definitions.name: ALLELE_NUM

definitions.description: Shortest distance from the variant to transcript
definitions.name: DISTANCE

definitions.description: The DNA strand (1 or -1) on which the transcript/feature lies
definitions.name: TRANSCRIPT_STRAND

definitions.description: Eg TP53, LRP1B, etc (same as Hugo_Symbol field except blank instead of Unknown
definitions.name: SYMBOL

definitions.description: The source of the gene symbol, usually HGNC, rarely blank, other sources include Uniprot_gn, EntrezGene, etc
definitions.name: SYMBOL_SOURCE

definitions.description: Gene identifier from the HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee if applicable
definitions.name: HGNC_ID

definitions.description: Biotype of transcript
definitions.name: BIOTYPE

definitions.description: A flag (YES) indicating that the VEP-based canonical transcript, the longest translation, was used for this gene. If not, the value is null
definitions.name: CANONICAL

definitions.description: The  CCDS identifier for this transcript, where applicable
definitions.name: CCDS

definitions.description: The Ensembl protein identifier of the affected transcript
definitions.name: ENSP

definitions.description: UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot accession
definitions.name: SWISSPROT

definitions.description: UniProtKB/TrEMBL identifier of protein product
definitions.name: TREMBL

definitions.description: UniParc identifier of protein product
definitions.name: UNIPARC

definitions.description: RefSeq identifier for this transcript
definitions.name: RefSeq

definitions.description: The   SIFT prediction and/or score, with both given as prediction (score)
definitions.name: SIFT

definitions.description: The PolyPhen prediction and/or score
definitions.name: PolyPhen

definitions.description: The exon number (out of total number)
definitions.name: EXON

definitions.description: The intron number (out of total number)
definitions.name: INTRON

definitions.description: The source and identifier of any overlapping protein domains
definitions.name: DOMAINS

definitions.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in   1000 Genomes
definitions.name: GMAF

definitions.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined African population
definitions.name: AFR_MAF

definitions.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined American population
definitions.name: AMR_MAF

definitions.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined East Asian population
definitions.name: EAS_MAF

definitions.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined European population
definitions.name: EUR_MAF

definitions.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined South Asian population
definitions.name: SAS_MAF

definitions.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in NHLBI-ESP African American population
definitions.name: AA_MAF

definitions.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in NHLBI-ESP European American population
definitions.name: EA_MAF

definitions.description: Clinical significance of variant from dbSNP
definitions.name: CLIN_SIG

definitions.description: Somatic status of each ID reported under Existing_variation (0, 1, or null)
definitions.name: SOMATIC

definitions.description: Pubmed ID(s) of publications that cite existing variant
definitions.name: PUBMED

definitions.description: The impact modifier for the consequence type
definitions.name: IMPACT

definitions.description: Indicates if this block of consequence data was picked by VEP's   pick feature (1 or null)
definitions.name: PICK

definitions.description: Sequence Ontology variant class
definitions.name: VARIANT_CLASS

definitions.description: Transcript support level, which is based on independent RNA analyses
definitions.name: TSL

definitions.description: Indicates by how many bases the HGVS notations for this variant have been shifted
definitions.name: HGVS_OFFSET

definitions.description: Indicates if existing variant is associated with a phenotype, disease or trait (0, 1, or null)
definitions.name: PHENO

definitions.description: Alleles in this variant have been converted to minimal representation before consequence calculation (1 or null)
definitions.name: MINIMISED

definitions.description: Global Allele Frequency from   ExAC
definitions.name: ExAC_AF

definitions.description: Adjusted Global Allele Frequency from ExAC
definitions.name: ExAC_AF_Adj

definitions.description: African/African American Allele Frequency from ExAC
definitions.name: ExAC_AF_AFR

definitions.description: American Allele Frequency from ExAC
definitions.name: ExAC_AF_AMR

definitions.description: East Asian Allele Frequency from ExAC
definitions.name: ExAC_AF_EAS

definitions.description: Finnish Allele Frequency from ExAC
definitions.name: ExAC_AF_FIN

definitions.description: Non-Finnish European Allele Frequency from ExAC
definitions.name: ExAC_AF_NFE

definitions.description: Other Allele Frequency from ExAC
definitions.name: ExAC_AF_OTH

definitions.description: South Asian Allele Frequency from ExAC
definitions.name: ExAC_AF_SAS

definitions.description: Copied from input VCF. This includes filters implemented directly by the variant caller and other external software used in the DNA-Seq pipeline. See below for additional details.
definitions.name: FILTER

definitions.description: The reference allele per VCF specs, and its five flanking base pairs
definitions.name: CONTEXT

definitions.description: |-delimited list of GDC VCF file identifiers
definitions.name: src_vcf_id

definitions.description: Unique GDC identifier for the underlying bam file
definitions.name: tumor_bam_uuid

definitions.description: Unique GDC identifier for the underlying normal bam file
definitions.name: normal_bam_uuid

definitions.description: Unique GDC identifier for the underlying case
definitions.name: case_id

definitions.description: GDC filters applied universally across all MAFs
definitions.name: GDC_FILTER

definitions.description: Overlapping COSMIC variants
definitions.name: COSMIC

definitions.description: Indicates whether this region overlaps with an MC3 variant for the same sample pair
definitions.name: MC3_Overlap

definitions.description: GDC implementation of validation checks. See notes section (#5) below for details
definitions.name: GDC_Validation_Status

definitions.description: |-delimited list of mutation caller(s) that agreed on this particular call, always in alphabetical order: muse, mutect, somaticsniper, varscan
definitions.name: callerName

definitions.description: |-delimited list of unique GDC identifiers for underlying MAF file
definitions.name: fileUUID

definitions.description: |-delimited list of name of underlying MAF file
definitions.name: fileName
